subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: new font released
msgSnippet: ... Yikes! Don t know what is going on here. Do you have the newest version downloaded? In previous versions I did mix up Cheer by assigning it to capital C
messageBody:
Anthony Grahn wrote:
>
>
> Hi Paul,
>
> I just noticed that in the Unicode version of Thoth, character U+E65E
> is a curious ligature but I believe you meant it to be Cheer.
>

Yikes! Don't know what is going on here. Do you have the newest version
downloaded? In previous versions I did mix up Cheer by assigning it to
capital "C" in the ascii set, and that could have mixed up the Unicode
font as well.

I just ran a test on the Unicode font, and it displays properly here. I
also checked the source file for the font, and that has the correct
character as well.

Let me know.

Paul
